name: 楊勝明
objective:
無刷直流及永磁同步電動機具有高效率、高功率 - 質量比，在家電、工業設備、及電動車輛產業都已被廣泛的應用，為目前最主要的動力馬達。本課程從基本的磁路分析及永久磁鐵開始，首先介紹無刷直流的運轉原理及控制方法，然後探討永磁同步電動機之控制理論，及驅動電路技術，最後說明控制系統實現及無轉軸位置感測器控制的方法。
Brushless dc and permanent-magnet synchronous motor have higher efficiency and energy to mass ratio in comparison to the other motors. They are gradually replacing induction motor and widely used in industry. This course begins with the theory of basic electromagnetic energy conversion, followed by the modeling and vector control theory for permanent-magnet synchronous motor, design and control of brushless dc motors, and the driving circuit design for these motors. Finally, sensorless PM machine control techniques are introduced.
